vclaim: U.S. Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez posted a video of herself being "scared" at discovering a garbage disposal in her apartment.
title: Was U.S. Rep. Ocasio-Cortez ‘Scared’ by Her Garbage Disposal?
subtitle: A New York City environmental office once estimated "less than 1 percent of households" in the city had such disposals.
author: Dan Evon
